activities: We process data into searchable database form for review by counsel before counsel produces that data on behalf of counsel's client in response to a discovery demand in civil litigation, a legislative or judicial subpoena,or other legal process.
recoursemech: BlueStar will assure compliance with the Safe Harbor Principles by committing to investigate and attempt to resolve complaints regarding violations of this privacy policy directly with the complainant and in the event that the complaint cannot be resolved by BlueStar internally, the complaint may be submitted for dispute resolution to BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints. Moreover, BlueStar will subject those employees who are found in violation of this policy to appropriate discipline.
